channel.title: Pi updating players online ? still need help:)
channel.description:
i got this working, but it dosent update if a player logs out [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/14msv8y.png[/img]
how do i make it update like now and then ?
i tryed to add this under process. but it dosent seem o update. [code]public void process() { getPA().sendFrame126("There are currently "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " players online.", 6570);[/code]

item.title: Pi updating players online ? still need help:)
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:6, topic:528492”]Add it you your servers tick :rolleyes:[/quote]Yeah and why not stick it in the process like he did with all the else clustered stuff.

Read full topic
